title.rendered: Amazon Brand Assets – How to Create a Premium Brand via Imagery with Judson Morgan of Butter.LA

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:46 — 26.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:46 — 26.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

We are still with Judson is a film-maker turned entrepreneur. He found quick success in Hollywood then turned his focus to business, where he scaled 2 Amazon brands to 8 figures.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • Why creating a visual identity or brand matters
  • Where to start when creating a brand story
  • How to find more information about your product
  • What colors, fonts, and logos to use in your branding
  • How to do branding by yourself
  • How to figure out other brand assets
  • How to make sure your product packaging has strong branding
  • To decide if you need to do lifestyle photography
  • How to reuse videos in your brand
